intro: Survive, evolve, and dominate in a world overrun by chaos!
description:
Eden Survivors is an intense action roguelike where you must fight endless waves of enemies in a world on the brink of collapse. Choose from unique heroes, unlock devastating abilities, and create unstoppable power combos to survive.

Each run is a new opportunity to evolve your combat style, discover deadly synergies, and challenge formidable bosses. Will you survive long enough to unleash your full potential?

Key Features:
- Fast-paced battles with dynamic roguelike mechanics.
- A wide selection of heroes, weapons, and abilities to customize your strategy.
- Permanent upgrades to help you progress with every attempt.
- Challenging maps filled with secrets and dangers at every turn.

The fate of humanity is in your hands. Survive, evolve, and dominate the chaos in Eden Survivors!
